title: 作业要写不完了
author: liukou
txt_content: 考试周考完，大作业做不完可咋整。

replies.author: 心动不动心
replies.txt_content: 做不完只能通宵来做了

replies.author: tian_na
replies.txt_content: 要相信奇迹

replies.author: 天才小猫咪
replies.txt_content: 继续赶作业吧

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 我觉得，那就通宵霸气，一次不行，那就来俩
额，现在不是放假了吗

replies.author: 耀月
replies.txt_content: 写不完就不要出来发帖 继续写啊

replies.author: hyzgzz
replies.txt_content: 试卷写不完了

replies.author: HackerRouter
replies.txt_content:
要相信奇迹
骚年 加油 通宵肝作业吧

replies.author: Mr.Hanth
replies.txt_content: 作业？不存在的！（默默看了看自己的5张数学卷）

replies.author: 壹方净土
replies.txt_content: 一人，一夜，一笔，一奇迹！

replies.author: JDxiyang
replies.txt_content: 考完了谁还管作业啊（狗头）

replies.author: 无名可取啊
replies.txt_content: 没写完还来看论坛？(明天要期末考试的我似乎更闲)

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content: 你们还没放假么，，，

replies.author: jack_a1SCS
replies.txt_content: 没有一个通宵完不成的
一个人，一根笔创造奇迹

replies.author: aitest
replies.txt_content: 没事，永远都有作业的

replies.author: MDS110
replies.txt_content: 那就别做

replies.author: skybai
replies.txt_content: 加油写啊，努力

replies.author: AmoyMartian
replies.txt_content: 那就别写了反正也写不完

replies.author: LHK1210
replies.txt_content: 相信努力XD

replies.author: 0-zero-0
replies.txt_content: 没有什么作业是8小时通宵干不完的

replies.author: 微醉的阳光
replies.txt_content: 一个人 一支笔 一个晚上 一具**

replies.author: 云吞hj
replies.txt_content: 一个人，一支笔，一个晚上，一个奇迹

replies.author: SangTea
replies.txt_content: 我以前暑假最后一天连续一天一夜写完

replies.author: mildy
replies.txt_content: 奇迹再现

replies.author: Dicro_scrive
replies.txt_content: 快期末了？应该管的不严吧

replies.author: 江月寒
replies.txt_content: 坐等奇迹发生

replies.author: tianleoo
replies.txt_content: 红牛：我与你同在。

replies.author: 式蒲_AOj52
replies.txt_content: 那就不要做了，上MC释放一下

replies.author: 问玄
replies.txt_content: 笔一放，书一落，蒙就完了

replies.author: dyx591710
replies.txt_content: 那你还在这里发帖？滚去写作业[doge]

replies.author: 北极仙光
replies.txt_content: 众所周知，中国的学生在写作业时往往能创造奇迹

replies.author: 爱打蛋的迪迦
replies.txt_content: 你把作业扔水里，让我妈拍照

replies.author: louyukai
replies.txt_content: 作业帮了解一下

replies.author: 102630464c
replies.txt_content: 一个人一支笔一个奇迹
